text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @GovMurphy Why do you keep lying that Obama left you broken tests. Mr President I will let you in on a secret. It’s call Novel Coronavirus and COVID-19 because it’s NEW to the world born in 2019. Obama left the WH in 2016. COVID-19 did not exist in 2016. #COVID19  born 2019 under 45th POTUS
